Text:
This book is a travesty. It's a disgrace. It's a personal opinion dressed as "science" by unverified claims and non-scientifically accepted sources using under-par research.

If you're the type of person that believes Santa is a scientifically proven persona, you'll probably believe what the author has to say.

If you're like me, this book is a good read if you need to relight your flame and have a good laugh.

Anyone claiming to feel rejuvenation the instant a food-source enters the mouth is a Donald Duck.

Go vegan.
